entries.title_d: The Imperial Inquisition is transporting sensitive data on heavily guarded shuttles across the Endor system. We have some new Space Assault Droids in our possession and if we can steal some of these vessels it will be a major victory in our campaign against the Inquisition. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
entries.title: Endor system: Duty mission: Capture Inquisitor data transporting shuttles.
entries.thanks_5: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_4: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_3: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_2: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_1: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.taunt_5: You stole the wrong shuttle Rebel, your punishment can't be anything but death.
entries.taunt_4: You know our orders men, leave no one alive.
entries.taunt_3: This pitiful attempt at theft is about to end. Terminating data shuttle.
entries.taunt_2: There's no way you are going anywhere with that ship Rebel.
entries.taunt_1: You have some nerve Rebel fool, or you're just stupid!
entries.target_disabled: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel disabled. Transferring droid model IG-31-V to target vessel. >
entries.recovery_success: Good job pilot, this information should be very valuable to our operation.
entries.quest_recover_d: The droid is attempting to gain control of the shuttle. While he's doing that, you need to keep the ship safe from Imperial forces. They will rather blow up their ship than have it stolen.
entries.quest_location_d: The Endor system has a very heavy Imperial presence for some reason. You can never let your guard down while travelling here.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the stolen shuttle to safety. The droid is calculating the jump to hyperspace and you need to keep the Imperial fighters that will undoubtedly chase you, away from the shuttle.
entries.quest_disable_d: The 'Lambda' shuttles used to transport the Inquisitions data are heavily guarded and well armed themselves. Come prepared pilot, it will be tough.
entries.panic_5: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_4: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_3: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_2: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_1: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.failed_escape: The data shuttle slipped out of your grasp pilot, mission aborted.
entries.failed_destroy: Blast! The data shuttle has been destroyed. Get out of there pilot!
entries.escort_wiped_out: Vortex Fleet Command: < Escort terminated, proceed with the mission pilot. >
entries.escort_remaining: Vortex Fleet Command: < Good job pilot, %DI escort ships remaining. >
entries.complete_5: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.complete_4: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.complete_3: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.complete_2: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.complete_1: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.complete: Onboard computer confirm target vessel at correct location. Initiating hyperspace jump.
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Scans show droid unit in contact with target vessel and initiating capture sequence. >
entries.capture_phase_1_5: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_4: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_3: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_2: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_1: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_complete: Vortex Fleet Command: < The droid is in control, escort the ship to safety. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: Coordinates uploaded. Intercept and disable this shuttle.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Receiving coordinates on a data shuttle now, stand by.
entries.angry_disable: There will be no where for you to hide after this Rebel!
entries.abort: Abort code received, trying to perform emergency hyperspace jump.
